text: He muminagana, allaha tomaderake emana kichu sikarera madhyame pariksa karabena, ye sikara paryanta tomadera hata o barsa sahaje'i pauchate parabe-yate allaha bujhate parena ye, ke take adrsyabhabe bhayakare. Ata'eba, ye byakti erapara sima atikrama karabe, tara jan'ya yantranadayaka sasti rayeche.
